title: How much kWh will use PSU (power supply) if the computer is on 100% usage (PSU=250W)? Is there any program to calculate that? Will it use 250W every second or like every hour? - Quora

response.answer_text: Do not rely too much on computations, mostly are estimations anyway.. You can measure and sample the actual energy used, then you can summarize the total by computations.. At least by actual measurements, efficiency can be derived afterwards since losses are going to be reflected on the measured parameters too..
